description: The only king stands on the standard chess board. You are given his position in format "cd", where $ c $ is the column from 'a' to 'h' and $ d $ is the row from '1' to '8'. Find the number of moves permitted for the king. Check the king's moves here https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/King\_(chess). ![](https://cdn.luogu.com.cn/upload/vjudge_pic/CF710A/c293477e407dd29c222477fd35652e45e6890a3c.png)King moves from the position e4
inputFormat: The only line contains the king's position in the format "cd", where 'c' is the column from 'a' to 'h' and 'd' is the row from '1' to '8'.
outputFormat: Print the only integer $ x $ — the number of moves permitted for the king.
translation:
这里只有一个国王在国际象棋的棋盘上。

你会知道这个国王的坐标 $cd$ ：其中 $c$ 是行，用字母 $a$ 到 $h$ 表示， $d$ 是列，用数字 $1$ 到 $8$ 表示。

现在，你需要求的是，这个国王可以移动到几个格子上。

例如：![](https://cdn.luogu.org/upload/vjudge_pic/CF710A/c293477e407dd29c222477fd35652e45e6890a3c.png)

图片中的国王位于 $e4$ ，他可以移动到 $8$ 个位置。

Translated by @dblark
